means: 绒毛，软脑膜的毛状内层

word_mean: 大脑绒被：大脑软膜和皮质的小血管网(此术语很少用)

sentence.Network_en: There were plenty of tomentum on the cultivated LEC surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 扫描电镜观察LEC立体感强、细胞表面微绒毛丰富.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 生物学词汇英语翻译(Q-Z) ... tomentous 被绒毛的 tomentum 绒毛 tomography 断层撮影法.
[茸毛]（tomentum）茸毛是由疏松的菌丝束组成的毡状的、毛发装或棉絮状的团块，通常存在于缺乏下皮层或下皮层发育不良的地衣 …

list.abs: Abaxial veins of leaves with dense white tomentum ., 叶背面脉具紧密的白色的绒毛层.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin, literally cushion stuffing'

means.word_mean: 1. filamentous hairlike growth on a plant;
2. a network of tiny blood vessels between the cerebral surface of the pia mater and the cerebral cortex
